description: Microsoft Clip Organizer was available with Microsoft Office XP to Office 2010. The tool helped users organize, manage, and access media files, such as clip art, photos, videos, and sounds. Additionally, Clip Organizer allowed users to share media collections with others through the export and import of MGC media catalog files, enabling consistent use of media across teams or projects.
